name: The hardest game ever (itch)
description:
Yo! So i made another very hard game, but now by
myself. Not very right game for "Playing both sides" theme, that was in this jam. This really don't need any credits, but:

Smol Credits:

Level design: Enity

This is for CCC game jam #1. If u completed game send me screenshot of final screen in discord: Enity#3259

stay squared.
